alert.note: Alert for Allen; Huntington; Kosciusko; Wabash; Wells; Whitley (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 2:09AM EDT until July 29 at 3:15AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Allen County in northeastern Indiana... Eastern Wabash County in north central Indiana... Southern Whitley County in northeastern Indiana... Huntington County in northeastern Indiana... Southeastern Kosciusko County in north central Indiana... Northeastern Wells County in northeastern Indiana... * Until 315 AM EDT. * At 208 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles south of Winona Lake to Peru, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Fort Wayne, Huntington, New Haven, Wabash, Bluffton, North Manchester, Ossian, South Whitley, Andrews, Markle, Aboite, Roanoke, Lancaster, Zanesville, Lagro, Uniondale, Mount Etna, Sidney, Yoder, and Liberty Mills. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Allen; Huntington; Kosciusko; Wabash; Wells; Whitley
